string-array.name: enginer_verb_about
string-array.item: Modification of a classical model of submachine gun MP5 from the company Heckler & Koch GmbH
German submachine gun of 9 mm caliber, created in the 1960-ies a group of engineers from Heckler & Koch GmbH
Universal submachine gun, a modification of the M16A2 with a shortened barrel 262 mm
Compact and lightweight submachine gun in size and weight only marginally superior automatic pistols
Latest submachine gun produced by Italian company Beretta. The weapon uses automation with a free gate and comes with a Picatinny rail
Polish is a Compact submachine gun, characterized by high accuracy and allowing to cause serious damage at close range.
Compact submachine gun developed by TSNIITOCHMASH in the mid 1990-ies by the order of FSB
Russian submachine gun developed by the Tula instrument design Bureau. Due to the large rate of fire and high firepower
Universal submachine gun caliber 5.56x45 mm, developed in the early 90-ies the German company Heckler & Koch
First modern firearms, created by Agency ADD and put into production by S&T Daewoo
Shortened machine, based on the Kalashnikov assault rifles of the hundredth series. Uses subsonic cartridges of caliber 9 x 39 mm
German submachine gun manufactured by the company Heckler & Koch (H&K). Uses cartridges of caliber 4.6x30 mm
This submachine gun of caliber of 9 mm is a modified version of an assault rifle Steyr AUG and is designed for special forces unit.
Famous Israeli sub-machine guns from the family of Uzi used by police and military in more than 90 countries
Submachine Gun caliber 9x19mm, developed by a group of experts headed by Victor Kalashnikov son of the famous designer
Submachine Gun caliber .45 ACP, developed by Transformational Defense Industries

string-array.name: enginer_kred_about
string-array.item: Compact weapon with lots of opportunities for modification. Due to the high rate of fire is very effective in close combat.
Compact machine, designed in 1998 based on the assault rifle SG 550. The barrel and gas tube shortened to 226 mm
Submachine Gun caliber 9x19mm Parabellum, which is manufactured by Calico Light Weapons Systems.
Belgian submachine gun developed by FN Herstal. Known for its comfortable and ergonomic design.
Export version of the gun QCW-05, developed by Chinese Corporation Jianshe Industries. Designed for special forces

string-array.name: enginer_box_about
string-array.item: Submachine Gun of the Czech production with a futuristic design and high piercing ability
Sub-machine Gun caliber mm 9Ñ…17 developed in Czechoslovakia. Weapons built under the scheme with a free gate.
South Korean submachine gun with an integrated silencer, first presented at the exhibition of arms IDEX in 2003. Is manufactured by S&T Daewoo.
The new generation of folding submachine guns, designed by the company Magpul Industries in 2008
Compact submachine gun designed for special forces unit. Features high accuracy and reliability even in extreme conditions
Famous submachine gun developed by Heckler & Koch. A weapon constructed according to the scheme with a free gate
Shortened version of the XM8 machine designed for combat at close range.
Shortened version of the assault rifle the ACR, developed as a replacement for the M16 for the US army
Shortened version of the SCAR machine, designed for crews of combat vehicles, helicopters and technical specialists.
Slot Machine with a retractable stock and an integrated silencer, designed based on the AR-15 as a replacement for H&K MP5 and similar weapons.
